title: Quick Clementine and Grapefruit Marmalade
directions: Combine the clementines, zest, grapefruit, sugar, and a pinch of salt in a medium pot over low heat.
Cook, stirring occasionally, until the juices are thick, 45 to 55 minutes.
Stir in the lemon juice. Transfer to a glass jar and refrigerate for up to 3 weeks.
ingredients: 1 grapefruit, pith cut off, seeded and chopped
